DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administrated cognitive behaviour therapy (CBT) is a feasible approach in the treatment of depressive symptoms and comorbid anxiety symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Delivered Cognitive Behaviour Therapy for Adolescent Depression
DOC.criteria: Be between the ages of 1519 years old Have symptoms of depression, major depression Suicidal ideation Alcohol addiction other major primary psychiatric disorder Ongoing psychological treatment recent (during last 4 weeks) change in psychiatric medication
